sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GOODS_SCHDUL( GOODS_CODE , SCHDUL_SN , BEGIN_DE , END_DE , DELETE_AT , MONDAY_POSBL_AT , TUSDAY_POSBL_AT , WDNSDY_POSBL_AT , THRSDAY_POSBL_AT , FRIDAY_POSBL_AT , SATDAY_POSBL_AT , SUNDAY_POSBL_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DT ) VALUES ( #GOODS_CODE# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SCHDUL_SN), 0)+1 FROM TB_GOODS_SCHDUL WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#) , REPLACE(#BEGIN_DE#, '-', '') , REPLACE(#END_DE#, '-', '') , 'N' , #MONDAY_POSBL_AT# , #TUSDAY_POSBL_AT# , #WDNSDY_POSBL_AT# , #THRSDAY_POSBL_AT# , #FRIDAY_POSBL_AT# , #SATDAY_POSBL_AT# , #SUNDAY_POSBL_AT# , #WRITNG_ID# , SYSDATE)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS_SCHDUL SET CL_NM = #CL_NM# , FILE_CODE = #FILE_CODE# , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_GOODS_SCHDUL SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT GOODS_CODE , SCHDUL_SN , BEGIN_DE , END_DE , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE , MONDAY_POSBL_AT , TUSDAY_POSBL_AT , WDNSDY_POSBL_AT , THRSDAY_POSBL_AT , FRIDAY_POSBL_AT , SATDAY_POSBL_AT , SUNDAY_POSBL_AT FROM TB_GOODS_SCHDUL WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE# AND SCHDUL_SN = #SCHDUL_SN#

SELECT GOODS_CODE , SCHDUL_SN , BEGIN_DE , END_DE , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE , MONDAY_POSBL_AT , TUSDAY_POSBL_AT , WDNSDY_POSBL_AT , THRSDAY_POSBL_AT , FRIDAY_POSBL_AT , SATDAY_POSBL_AT , SUNDAY_POSBL_AT FROM TB_GOODS_SCHDUL WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE# AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY SCHDUL_SN
